text:
Hey, do portals still need to be enabled for cms-react? I'm getting this error when I try to deploy for the first time:
```âœ– Failed to upload connections-react project files to dev (XXXXXXXXX)
[ERROR] The post in account XXXXXXXX was bad. Platform version is missing from your project configuration. Please add the platformVersion field to the hsproject.json file, then try uploading the project again. Available versions: [2023.2].```
thanks for the report Anze - i'll take a look at this.

```// /package.json
    "deploy": "hs project upload project"```
I can run the project locally...looking for typos but don't see any
<@UAYBXDG4U> <@UCY83QS6Q> any idea what might be wrong here? I'm pretty much just following the "getting started" guide so far...I think I'm stuck at this point
had to update my cli (and maybe install it directly in the outer package.json instead of `-g`
ok so this solved?
yea, I think the error threw me off but everything works now
having the right version of the CLI is critical
`cms.functions.read` is a serverless related scope - this is also tied to enterprise. Are there calls to serverless functions involved?

running into an interesting error when I run the project locally:
```StatusCodeError: 403 - {"status":"error","message":"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.","correlationId":"269e2a25-0973-42e3-9dea-6a2a584707ac","errors":[{"message":"One or more of the following scopes are required.","context":{"requiredScopes":["cms.functions.read"]}}],"links":{"scopes":"<https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES"}```
I'm not running any serverless functions and I enabled all of the scope that were available after deactivating the old personalAccessKey
I'll delete `HubSpot.config.yml` and try to reset it...but it's weird
am I missing functions in some way that can be unlocked or is necessary? (I don't plan on using them for this project)
No don't have any serverless functions, the proxy doesnt work either
and this is during dev - not build/deploy correct?
And doing any hot reloads while autofields option is on in the dev server also crashes it
Yea during dev
can you DM me the portal in question?
Can't debug errors now and hublData not getting passed correctly hah
are you seeing this in the browser or the terminal?
Terminal
can you DM me the entire terminal ouput
if there is other error stack above that
sending now
